website_summaries.verdict: This single lens may be a little on the pricy side and needs a special case, but this macro lens is phenomenal at capturing the tiniest details to deliver exceptional photos.
pros: Award winning 10x macro lens for capturing incredible detail and depth
Removable light diffuser for taking pictures without shadows
cons: Unfortunately, macro photographers will need to outfit their smartphone with an official Moment M-series Photo Case or Battery Photo Case to attach this lens

customer_reviews.title: Needs case, don’t buy, won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell if it’s good or not. They didn’t say you need a specific case for it to attach. Now of course I have to buy that too which i now won’t do. Prefer more transparent pricing and disclosures as to what you need entirely for this to work. Disappointing especially considering it’s the most expensive on the market.
customer_reviews.author: j Dunn’s

customer_reviews.title: Limited use, but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Does it really well for the one thing it does, photographing still objects at ultra close up. I’m not quite sure how else this lens can be useful. It has a preset/fixed depth of focus, you have to get very close, within half & inch, to the object, otherwise its blurry. So, other than taking pic of surface texture or tiny things, its not very useful. I wanted to take shots of insects, but by the time you get that close, they’d hop off. You literally have to hover over & cover the object with the white bowl.
customer_reviews.author: RX100

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: This lens is great. The build quality is fantastic and the images are sharp. I haven't had the pleasure of taking it outside yet so I attached a few quick indoor macros I took using this lens and my Pixel 3. It may be a highly situational lens, but it is a ton of fun to use. Highly recommend this and all of Moment's lenses. Just a reminder in case you're unaware, you need one of their cases to mount their lenses to your phone. They do not clip on or attach any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Bluelions1180

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not great for live photography which is mainly why I purchased these lenses. They do a good job, when they actually get into focused. The big issue is that you have to be extremely close for the lens to focus. So close that I'm nearly touching the subject with the lenses. This is a major flaw, especially with macro photography and how fragile everything is.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Fun To Tinker With. Quality Feel.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool little item. Not something I mess with every day but its on my desk and it's super simple to attach to my iPhone 7 with the Moment case I got, too. The fit & finish of the lens are superb. I like that the translucent lens hood can be removed and it comes with a little storage bag. Nice touches. It also comes with a little lens cap. Mine pops off too easily, though. The photos I've taken so far are clear and sharp, though there is some peripheral blur as the depth of field with macro lenses is short. Might get the Moment telephoto next.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Baird

customer_reviews.title: An essential
customer_reviews.text: I'm a knitter and I love working with hand dyed yarns, and this lens helps me appreciate them even more. I love how easy it is to use this lens and how well it focuses. The first picture of the blue yarn is using the lens and the second picture is cropped to just the circled part. You can see every little fiber. It's like using a microscope! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rosenzweig

customer_reviews.title: I love my macro!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first moment lens. I originally wanted to buy the wide first, but I am content with having this macro lens for now. The construction of the lens is sturdy and has a good weight to it. I love Moment! A few of my friends were questioning why I would pay so much for an iphone lens, but it is so worth it. I feel much more comfortable spending real money on something I know is going to work and be top notch, than continuing to spend my money trying a lot of products, trying to find the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Ishii

customer_reviews.title: Pixel 4 telephoto lens + Macro lens = awesome
customer_reviews.text: Using the macro lens on the telephoto camera on the Pixel 4 (the camera on the right side) is pretty cool. You have to zoom in on the camera app to 2x until it turns on the second camera. but with macro + telephoto you can get some pretty cool shots.
customer_reviews.author: StevenP

customer_reviews.title: OMG!  LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent but it's true that you have to get right on the subject, which is difficult if you're photographing insects. I love the quality and clarity of macro photos of flowers and plants. I'm a gardener and write articles so this macro lens has given a visual boost to submissions. You have to work it around to pick up the clearest shot. Not the easiest to use but what do I know? It's my first and only macro lens and I'm very much a novice yet, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: V Mats

customer_reviews.title: The lenses are quite impressive for such a small size ...
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are quite impressive for such a small size. I bought them for my wife and she is absolutely loving the results.
customer_reviews.author: cramblda

customer_reviews.title: Banger quality
customer_reviews.text: The moment stuff is as always high quality, comes in a sweet package and looks just great on my iphone. This will be a great season to me. These are my first cellphone lenses. I‘m a photographer and I do highly recommend those lenses. To me, lens quality and picture quality goes hand in hand. Cellphone or mirrorless it doesn‘t matter. You will see it.
customer_reviews.author: bounes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware . Doesn’t work if you don’t purchase their case !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 2 stars because the seller and also the company refuse to tell people that in order to use this device you need to purchase “THEIR OWN BRAND PHONE CASE” which is extremely expensive and not pleasing to the eye maybe for some but I have the iPhone XR and I believe it came in black with the credit car holder and brown with credit card holder. I personally don’t like the holder in the back for the simple reason if you lose your phone you lose absolutely everything inside. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: krista corsale

customer_reviews.title: Solid Lens. You'll need to get REALLY close to subject.
customer_reviews.text: As with the other moment lenses, this one is very well made, very solid construction. Be mindful that the focus distance requires you to be really really close to your subject. Tested on a ring, with the lens hood on, the ring practically was about an inch from the sensor to get focus. You'll need a lot of light but the results are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing macro lens for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap lens but you get every bit of quality that you pay for and it’s worth it! The lenses twist right on. I didn’t have to fumble around with the clips which make me nervous will scratch my lens if I miss. I attached photos of some of my house plants leaves
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great lens for macro photos
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this lens in early January but didn't get around to really trying it out until recently. If you need a new hobby while you're under self-quarrantine due to concerns about the coronavirus, macro photography is the way to go! If you can't go anywhere you can still take amazing pics by focusing on the macro world around you. The lens takes a little getting used to but it takes beautiful photos.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent macro lens!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the lens! Keep in mind you will also have to buy the phone case that holds the lens. But it is a nice looking protective case and hold the lenses securely.
customer_reviews.author: denbren

customer_reviews.title: Picture and product qualities hand in hand
customer_reviews.text: This lens might be a little bit more expensive than other lenses, but, oh boy, is it worth it! Forget those clip-on lenses, those won't stay in place and pics quality is so so. Of course, you will need the case, this is what makes it a lot better. And the picture quality is pretty darn good! Do yourself a favor, save some money if you're planning in buying a cheaper one, a get this lens
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre De Faveri

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the lenses I purchased - Moment is a great company - makes a great product
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We were impressed with the quality of product and picture.
customer_reviews.author: missions

customer_reviews.title: mounts to the Moment case easily and securely
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid little gem of a lens - well constructed, mounts to the Moment case easily and securely, and gives great macro image capability for the iPhone. I'm so glad someone is out there making quality photographic accessories for our mobile devices. This is the wave of the future for casual amateur shutterbugs like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Moment really knows how to make awesome lenses! Love it
customer_reviews.author: WhiteShadow

customer_reviews.title: As close as you can get...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun lens for getting close up macro photos on an iPhone. Extreme depth of field. The quality of the glass, materials and photos is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Shreve

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This little lens (which you need with a specific phone cover) is amazing! The quality if fantastic. You need to get within centimeters of the object but the picture quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Macro with the ultimate portability
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most unique lenses I’ve used before. It makes me even more excited for spring to get here so I can take macro shots of flowers! The in-focus part of the photo is crispy and the bokeh is gorgeous. Another home run from the awesome people at Moment!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a true macro lens
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece, it’s pretty cool on how close you get.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moment Lens Yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens so much. Since being at home so often I haven't had a need for my wide lens and this little macro has opened up a whole new world of photo taking right in my backyard. Beautiful clear photos and details with no editing.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Review-ku
customer_reviews.text: Lens is fantastic Just make sure you buy the case Take little photos
customer_reviews.author: Cody Saffel

customer_reviews.title: This it’s why it’s the best.
customer_reviews.text: It’s literally the best attachment lens you could ever need for macro on a cellphone ever. It’s a Moment lens, of course it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio Caldera

customer_reviews.title: Doubled my photographic opps
customer_reviews.text: I had stopped photographing wildflowers because I just couldn't do them justice but this lens, that I'm able to easily snap to the Moment iphone case, has opened a new appreciation for these small subjects... and the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Carole O Richter

customer_reviews.title: Moment Macro is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This lens is amazing! The quality and construction are superb! For the price you cannot beat. Paired with the Moment app, this lens is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Terry

customer_reviews.title: Turns your phone into a high quality camera.
customer_reviews.text: Down side I had to get all new lenses when I changed phones but the new ones fit much better. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: James Prain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday. It was a total hit and was exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo

customer_reviews.title: Best macro lens for any phone
customer_reviews.text: Craziest macro lens I’ve ever owned for a phone. Ever. The quality is crazy amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Asania Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Moment Macro Lens
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this wonderful lens for my phone sometime last year, and since then I have been playing around and experimenting with macro photography. The results are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning photos using this lens
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the Moment lenses. Well worth the price. Because look at these!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Important gear for macro lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for macro... Build quality and picture quality is excellent...really worth to buy
customer_reviews.author: Karthick swaminathan

customer_reviews.title: Great pics
customer_reviews.text: Love the lens. These wildflowers are do small, I hadn’t really appreciated their beauty until I took these pictures.
customer_reviews.author: RuthR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love ‏ The shallow depth of field it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome macro lens for your phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lens, especially for shooting flowers and insects!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I want to try the other lenses soon.
customer_reviews.author: db5

customer_reviews.title: Challenging yet rewarding!
customer_reviews.text: Challenging yet rewarding lens! Prompt shipping and fantastic customer service! Their team does a wonderful job following up. Thank you Moment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my moment macro lens. It allows me to slow life down and enjoy the beauty close up.
customer_reviews.author: Jan MCKENZIE

customer_reviews.title: Deer Tick & Ladybug up-close
customer_reviews.text: This tick is the size of a pin head X 2. I'm happy with the quality of the lady bug because it was taken on a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rock

customer_reviews.title: I love these lenses so much that I need the telephoto ...
customer_reviews.text: OK, I love these lenses so much that I need the telephoto and I'm not telling anyone I bought them because I want it to be my secret! Only con was the shipping wasn't prime fast!
customer_reviews.author: JenZat

customer_reviews.title: It causes the ring to become dirty quickly, and the lens can be touched or ...
customer_reviews.text: In order to get a clear shot of your subject matter, you have to press the white plastic ring against said object. It causes the ring to become dirty quickly, and the lens can be touched or scratched easily. Returned with the crap phone case (pixel 2)
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: but well machined with excellent glass. Liked it so much I've ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible macro lens. Bought this for my new phone. Not cheap, but well machined with excellent glass. Liked it so much I've ordered the telephoto, wide and fish eye lenses. Some photos attached. Dead nandina twig, dogwood leaf, textures of my bracelets, tiny crinoid fossils, texture of a dilapidated vinyl top on a Cadillac. These were all taken my first time to use the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: Beats lugging a big camera around
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a kit that was small, easy to use and would take great photos. Moment products had some nice reviews and the lens/camera case setup looked to be the strongest and you didn't have to worry about the attached lens being exactly lined up with your Iphone lens. Pretty full proof setup. I purchased the Macro, Wide angle and Zoom and all three lens with my Iphone X take great pictures. The Macro does take a bit of "fiddling" with but I think it's me. My daughter has used it to take Macro photos of beaded jewelry she's made and the photos are impressive.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I did my homework and settled on this system
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! I am floored by the quality and the resulting images. I am glad I did my homework and settled on this system. Not a toy!
customer_reviews.author: B. Block

customer_reviews.title: Macros at a new level that beats any SLR
customer_reviews.text: We really took some time to figure out that the white guard on the lens is also the amount of distance between the subject and the lens. Overall build quality is good but you really need to be into Macro photography to make the most of your investment. Pictures come out in great detail
customer_reviews.author: Cyberstud

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Before and after picture, wow there is a huge difference. The spider is just too small to get into focus with the iPhone camera. But with the macro lens it’s not a problem it makes the quality great and gets into focus.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fun new shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Everything has been said about this lens. I just love it coz it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Lady

customer_reviews.title: Patience may pay off with this lens
customer_reviews.text: Struggled with this lens. Seemed like you had to get so close to a subject, you never had enough light.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of using the lens with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love taking macro photos, but with the improvement in cell phone photo quality, I haven’t been playing with my big digital camera in awhile. The little lens gives me the opportunity to experiment with macro again!
customer_reviews.author: Anonom Emous

customer_reviews.title: I love this lens!
customer_reviews.text: Moment is awesome. I have a few of their lenses. I think they are fabulous and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: McCollins

customer_reviews.title: Better be ready for your close-up
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize just how close to the subject the camera lens would have to be to get any semblance of clarity. I returned this lens because I would never use it.
customer_reviews.author: smartperson

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely difficult to use outside. Has to be on a tripod. To attach the lens must remove the case at least partially.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was never really interested in macro photography before but using this lens has really peaked my interest in taking more macro photographs. Very impressed with the build quality and like the other lenses from Moment it comes with a lens cap and drawstring pouch. Highly recommend this lens if you are interested in macro smartphone photography.
customer_reviews.author: G Insch

customer_reviews.title: Good value, like them
customer_reviews.text: Are these pro-level lenses, no. But they are very portable and add a lot of capability to normal cell phone pictures. For me these are fun and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherTechnoweenie

customer_reviews.title: Great closeup lens
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lens but you must buy the iPhone case to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Aloysia C. Hamalainen

customer_reviews.title: Love these Lenses
customer_reviews.text: I have almost given up my DSL for my iPhone . These lenses make great photos achievable !
customer_reviews.author: Wincheryl

customer_reviews.title: Macro Lens
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lens, great build quality, great price. I own three Moment lens and when mounted to my iPhone 8 plus and using the Filmic Pro app the results are simply stunning. Buy Now!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Best Lens for Iphone
customer_reviews.text: All the lens are fantastic, i have all of them now
customer_reviews.author: Dhanesh Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my new iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my new iPhone 8 Plus! I don't carry my camera as often anymore now that I have lenses and case from Moment!
customer_reviews.author: Faz Isa

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Moment Macro Lens
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease with which it attaches to my iPhone X camera case. Great closeup quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Early opinion is good...
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 days into the lens, and it appears to be as desired, will take a few days off use to get a good review. One slightly confusing item is the provided cap, should it go over the bayonet end or should the translucent hood be removed and it go over that end? Would think it needs two caps. Bag is snug fit, so some effort to put in and work out. That said, like the concept.
customer_reviews.author: John Story

product_meta.title: Moment - Macro Lens for iPhone, Pixel, Samsung Galaxy and OnePlus Camera Phones
feature_bullets: The Moment Macro Lens works with iPhone, Pixel, Galaxy and OnePlus Phones. This product includes a lens, lens cap, and microfiber bag.
This product REQUIRES you to purchase a Moment Case OR Battery Photo Case to attach the lens to your phone. Mounts over either lens on dual lens phones enabling nearly limitless creativity.

The Moment Macro lens captures life sized images of the smallest objects at the highest quality. It’s removable light diffuser enables images without shadows while providing the perfect one-inch working distance. Its multi-element glass design provides edge to edge clarity.
Moment makes the highest quality attachment lenses on the market. Made with aerospace grade metal and the same hand-polished glass used for high-end 4K film lenses.
We backup our products with a lifetime warranty, great customer service and a 100% satisfaction guarantee with free shipping and returns. Ask us how to get set up with a Moment gear guide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars235 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
